biocontainers.name: quantiprot
biocontainers.summary: Quantiprot is a python package for quantitative analysis of protein sequences

biotools.summary: Provides a simple and consistent interface to multiple methods for quantitative characterization of protein sequences. The package can be used to calculate dozens of characteristics directly from sequences or using physico-chemical properties of amino acids.

bioschemas.name: quantiprot
bioschemas.summary: Provides a simple and consistent interface to multiple methods for quantitative characterization of protein sequences. The package can be used to calculate dozens of characteristics directly from sequences or using physico-chemical properties of amino acids.
